de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.datasource.parser

Class AbstractStreamingParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.datasource.parser.AbstractParser
      • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.datasource.parser.AbstractStreamingParser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BundleStreamSource, Parser, StreamingParser
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClusteringVectorParser, NumberVectorLabelParser, SimpleTransactionParser

    public abstract class AbstractStreamingParser
extends AbstractParser
implements StreamingParser
    Base class for streaming parsers. TODO: build our own replacement for BufferedReader, which recycles the string builder.
    Author:
    Erich Schubert
